title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.73 - Limitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.73 - Limitation

State Regulations

The rules and regulations set forth herein, sections
651.70
-651.77, inclusive, are
limited to those projects or major parts thereof which at the time of
construction, are located in: (a) a
town which has a total population of 17,000 or less; or
(b) a town outside of village area which has
a population density per square mile of less than 100 persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
651.73

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
